external_references.description: Fraser, N., et al. (2019, August 7). Double DragonAPT41, a dual espionage and cyber crime operation APT41. Retrieved September 23, 2019.
Glyer, C, et al. (2020, March). This Is Not a Test: APT41 Initiates Global Intrusion Campaign Using Multiple Exploits. Retrieved April 28, 2020.

objects.description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) modified legitimate Windows services to install malware backdoors.(Citation: FireEye APT41 Aug 2019) [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) created the StorSyncSvc service to provide persistence for Cobalt Strike.(Citation: FireEye APT41 March 2020)
